title: Dawie Steyn
text: Dawie Steyn (born 5 January 1984) is a retired South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer. He played as a <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%231.%20Prop">Loosehead Prop</a>. He represented the <a href="Bulls%20%28rugby%20union%29">Bulls</a> in <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> as well as the <a href="Blue%20Bulls">Blue Bulls</a> in both the <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> and <a href="Vodacom%20Cup">Vodacom Cup</a>. Between 2008 and 2011 he played for the <a href="Pumas%20%28Currie%20Cup%29">Pumas</a> prior to joining the Bulls for their <a href="2012%20Super%20Rugby%20season">2012 Super Rugby season</a>.
